strings.app.your_privacy_is_important_to_u:
Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we
					collect, use, and protect your data when you use our app.
strings.app.no_personal_data_required_you_:
- No Personal Data Required: You can use the app without creating an
					account or providing personal details.
strings.app.interaction_data_we_may_collec:
- Interaction Data: We may collect non-personal usage data (e.g.,
					which mini-apps are most popular) to improve the experience.
strings.app.ai_conversations_the_chat_inte:
- AI Conversations: The chat interactions are processed in real-time
					but are not stored or used to track you.
strings.app.improve_app_performance_and_us: - Improve app performance and user experience.
strings.app.we_do_not_sell_rent_or_share_y:
We do not sell, rent, or share your data with third parties for
					advertising purposes.
strings.app.to_ensure_smooth_performance_w:
To ensure smooth performance, we may use third-party services (such as
					analytics tools) that comply with privacy laws. These services may
					collect anonymized data for app improvement but do not track your
					identity.
strings.app.we_take_appropriate_security_m:
We take appropriate security measures to protect your data from
					unauthorized access or misuse. However, no system is 100% secure, so
					we encourage users to avoid sharing sensitive information in AI
					interactions.
strings.app.access_deletion_you_can_reques:
- Access & Deletion: You can request to see or delete any collected
					data.
strings.app.optout_you_can_disable_analyti:
- Opt-Out: You can disable analytics tracking in the settings (if
					applicable).
strings.app.we_may_update_this_privacy_pol:
We may update this Privacy Policy as the app evolves. Any changes will
					be reflected here, and we’ll notify users if necessary.
strings.app.if_you_have_any_questions_abou:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, feel free to
					reach out at
strings.app.need_help_fill_out_the_form_be:
Need help? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as
				possible.
strings.app.thank_you_your_message_has_bee: Thank you! Your message has been received.
strings.app.your_chat_history_will_appear_: Your chat history will appear here
strings.app.voice_recognition_not_availabl: Voice recognition not available on this device

app/privacy-policy.tsx.text:
Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we
					collect, use, and protect your data when you use our app.

- No Personal Data Required: You can use the app without creating an
					account or providing personal details.

- Interaction Data: We may collect non-personal usage data (e.g.,
					which mini-apps are most popular) to improve the experience.

- AI Conversations: The chat interactions are processed in real-time
					but are not stored or used to track you.
- Improve app performance and user experience.

We do not sell, rent, or share your data with third parties for
					advertising purposes.

To ensure smooth performance, we may use third-party services (such as
					analytics tools) that comply with privacy laws. These services may
					collect anonymized data for app improvement but do not track your
					identity.

We take appropriate security measures to protect your data from
					unauthorized access or misuse. However, no system is 100% secure, so
					we encourage users to avoid sharing sensitive information in AI
					interactions.

- Access & Deletion: You can request to see or delete any collected
					data.

- Opt-Out: You can disable analytics tracking in the settings (if
					applicable).

We may update this Privacy Policy as the app evolves. Any changes will
					be reflected here, and we’ll notify users if necessary.

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, feel free to
					reach out at

app/support.tsx.text:
Need help? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as
				possible.
Thank you! Your message has been received.

components/History.tsx.text: Your chat history will appear here
